snippet.title: Wardens Rising - Teaser Trailer | EPIC, Steam, PS5, Xbox S/X
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1055560/Wardens_Rising/

WARDENS RISING is a one of a kind, action-packed game of heroism, strategy, and epic battles. Choose a hero, then team-up or go solo to defend mankind in this thrilling blend of ARPG Shooter and Base Defense. You are the last line of defense against a relentless inter-dimensional enemy threat. Prepare your hero, plan your strategy, build defenses, and fight to protect vital energy cores from massive invasions; not only to save humanity but attain ever-lasting glory. 

Choose from 5 unique heroes and customize them with a variety of tactical gear and defense technology like towers, traps, and walls. Level-up to become more powerful, unlock new technology and character options. Defeat invasions on all 24 campaign maps, take-down epic bosses, and face invasions on 16 endlessly replayable mission-mode maps to become a legendary Warden.

For news and details on Wardens Rising, visit and follow us on our social channels:
Website: https://wardensrising.com/
X - https://x.com/BigMoxiGames
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWhiNmUKQfysTjoYVGz9E2Q
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/bigmoxigames/?hl=en
Tik Tok - https://www.tiktok.com/@big.moxi.games?_t=8lCKD1UjNHP&_r=1
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/WardensRising/

"Cjbeards - Heart Of The Wicked" is under a Creative Commons (CC-BY 3.0) license
Music promoted by BreakingCopyright: https://bit.ly/bkc-heart
